name: The Echelon Group
overview:
The Echelon Group is comprised of several components that work with many facets of the music industry. Founded in 1999 and based in the New York area, The Echelon Group has left its footprints all over the globe. Today, The Echelon Group is an independent concert production company. The company works as a buyer and producer for concerts. The Echelon Group also works with companies, individuals, and sponsors to produce events globally.

Explosive growth characterizes the company in becoming a major contender with the heavyweights. With strong leadership and ambitious growth plans, The Echelon Group is looking forward to a bright and successful future.
